results.title: [Directions]
results.brief_description:
A program in four sections providing both good and bad examples in the areas of time management, organizational skills and communication.
1. The Morning mess
2. I didn’t know it was going to be like this
3. What do you want from me
4. Just let me explain
Title is missing from the film.
